  "Allegations" : "Allegation Activity Dates 11/2015 - 4/26/2017 Client alleges that registered representative did not specifically inform client and her husband (the insured) of a life insurance policy's suicide exclusion when the registered representative recommended new life insurance coverage to update and consolidate existing coverage on client's husband.
